sample

Class SpellCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Card
      • sample.SpellCard

  • public class SpellCard
extends Card
    Type of card: Spell. It contains the spell target, the effect and the magnitude of the action. This class acts as a controller for the spellCard.fxml file, so it contains all information needed for rendering a spell card.
